title: Sayonara Watashi no Cramer (Farewell, My Dear Cramer)
synopsis: Over the years, the reputation of women's soccer in Japan has been gradually waning. Despite this rather bleak scenario, there are still some schools with teams trying to keep the sport alive. With that, glimmers of hope are starting to appear.
